item.title: Member code don't work 508
item.dc:creator: @superstarz superstarz
item.description:
@superstarz wrote:

this is my member code

else if (cmd[0].equals(“givemember”) && p.username.equals(“bob”)) {
String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1));
Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)];
if (p2 != null) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just given membership to " + p2.username + “.”);
p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, “starz has just given you membership! You can now go to the member zone!”);
p.member = 1;
}
}

i want to wear a member item
but it keep on saying i must be a member
